channel.title: Introducing Auxy Demo (4.0)
channel.description:
If anyone remembers the OG Introducing Auxy Demo from the OG app (now discontinued) then they will feel the nostalgia from my remake/remix. I tried really hard to make it true to the original without changing too much. I remember the first time I heard it when I discovered the app, I knew NOTHING about music production, and I was so confused with how it worked, so I deleted the app when I needed the space and then I completely forgot about it. Now, I completed the circle, I delete other apps so I that I can keep Auxy and I know A LOT about music production. I used all the new features and base instruments (this is on Beta) so that... [spoiler](maybe it can be featured as a demo in the app to show its potential to new users xD don’t tell anyone) [/spoiler] I can showcase them :slight_smile:.
---------- I humbly present to you, in honor of the Auxy devs, [Introducing Auxy Demo](https://app.auxy.co/projects/PFY1B4ztRKSjZOXzbLUOcQ==).

item.title: Introducing Auxy Demo (4.0)
item.dc:creator: RazerFireRiot
item.description:
Wow I like how you added a little more instruments along with the original, and the titles you made for the loops!
I’ve actually made a remake of the same demo from the original Auxy, and the only difference is the instruments used. You can check out my version if you’d like: https://app.auxy.co/projects/zWRhYO4GUbdKT8_k1IKC-w==
(PS: I still have the original version on my iPad)

Read full topic

item.title: Introducing Auxy Demo (4.0)
item.dc:creator: Zeph
item.description:
If anyone remembers the OG Introducing Auxy Demo from the OG app (now discontinued) then they will feel the nostalgia from my remake/remix. I tried really hard to make it true to the original without changing too much. I remember the first time I heard it when I discovered the app, I knew NOTHING about music production, and I was so confused with how it worked, so I deleted the app when I needed the space and then I completely forgot about it. Now, I completed the circle, I delete other apps so I that I can keep Auxy and I know A LOT about music production. I used all the new features and base instruments (this is on Beta) so that… spoiler I can showcase them .

I humbly present to you, in honor of the Auxy devs, Introducing Auxy Demo.
